abstract: Home Depot may pay its chief executive, Frank Blake $8.9 million this year, less than the $39.7 million it paid his predecessor, Robert Nardelli, who was ousted this month amid criticism of his compensation. Mr. Blake, who took over Jan. 2, received a base salary of $975,000. He will get the rest if he meets the board’s profit and stock performance goals, the company said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot may pay its chief executive, Frank Blake $8.9 million this year, less than the $39.7 million it paid his predecessor, Robert Nardelli, who was ousted this month amid criticism of his compensation. Mr. Blake, who took over Jan. 2, received a base salary of $975,000. He will get the rest if he meets the board’s profit and stock performance goals, the company said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Home Depot’s New C.E.O. to Receive $8.9 Million
